hero.tagline: FULL STACK DEVELOPER & CREATIVE CONTENT CREATOR
hero.intro: EXPRESS MY UNDERSTANDING OF THE WORLD THROUGH MY WORK

info.paragraphIntro: Trying to express my understanding of the world through my works — I create artworks and digital experiences that feel clear, intentional, and alive.
info.paragraph:
I care about clean code, performance, and the small details that make an interface effortless to use.
My creative practice spans logo & font design, GFX & illustration, and music composition
DnB / Progressive House / Artcore
I'm drawn to creation, and I bring that visual sensibility into every system I design and ship.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I’m MySxan, a sophomore at UIUC studying CS + GGIS, and an interest-driven full-stack developer and creative content creator. I put real time into UI/UX, performance, and interaction details — so an interface isn’t just presenting information, but truly engaging with the user.

In both learning and creation, I’m always chasing a better version of the work, using an interdisciplinary mindset to solve problems. My work sits at the intersection of engineering and art — from web apps and tools, to visual design, illustration, and music composition. I enjoy breaking complex problems into clean, modular pieces, then refining each part until it feels “right.”

Recently, I’ve been building a course-planning web app for schedule preview and optimization, along with smaller utilities that improve everyday workflows. I also create music (DnB / Progressive House / Artcore) and illustrations, and I like merging these practices into a unified creative language.
If you’re looking for interdisciplinary thinking, or want to collaborate / commission work, feel free to reach out.
